view.description: The amount of detail to return for a hold.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters.

$block: A hold. A hold prevents the specified Google Workspace service from purging data for specific accounts or all members of an organizational unit. To work with Vault resources, the account must have the [required Vault privileges] (https://support.google.com/vault/answer/2799699) and access to the matter. To access a matter, the account must have created the matter, have the matter shared with them, or have the **View All Matters** privilege.

$ul: **accounts**: If set, the hold applies to the specified accounts and **orgUnit** must be empty.
**corpus**: The service to be searched.
**holdId**: The unique immutable ID of the hold. Assigned during creation.
**name**: The name of the hold.
**orgUnit**: The organizational unit covered by a hold. This structure is immutable.
**holdTime**: When the organizational unit was put on hold. This property is immutable.
**orgUnitId**: The organizational unit's immutable ID as provided by the [Admin SDK](https://developers.google.com/admin-sdk/).
**query**: Service-specific options for holds.
**driveQuery**: Options for Drive holds.
**includeSharedDriveFiles**: To include files in shared drives in the hold, set to **true**.
**includeTeamDriveFiles**: To include files in Team Drives in the hold, set to **true**.
**groupsQuery**: Query options for group holds.
**endTime**: The end time for the query. Specify in GMT. The value is rounded to 12 AM on the specified date.
**startTime**: The start time for the query. Specify in GMT. The value is rounded to 12 AM on the specified date.
**terms**: The [search operators](https://support.google.com/vault/answer/2474474) used to refine the messages covered by the hold.
**hangoutsChatQuery**: Options for Chat holds.
**includeRooms**: To include messages in Chat spaces the user was a member of, set to **true**.
**mailQuery**: Query options for Gmail holds.
**endTime**: The end time for the query. Specify in GMT. The value is rounded to 12 AM on the specified date.
**startTime**: The start time for the query. Specify in GMT. The value is rounded to 12 AM on the specified date.
**terms**: The [search operators](https://support.google.com/vault/answer/2474474) used to refine the messages covered by the hold.
**voiceQuery**: Options for Voice holds.
**coveredData**: A list of data types covered by the hold. Should be non-empty. Order does not matter and duplicates are ignored.
**updateTime**: The last time this hold was modified.
